name: Bearmuda
description:
Icebear has gotten some news of some lost people in the BEARmuda triangle!
The goal of the game (not explained in game), is to save people from the ocean by hoisting them up in your boat, giving them icecream from your icecream venue, and then building a house for them!

This game was made for the "My first game jam: Summer 2022" jam!

Controls: (can be played with controlles, highly reccomended)

Normal player:
Walk with  WASD / Left stick.
Sprint with Left shift / L2.
Interact with Space / X(A).
Camera with Mouse / Right stick.

Boat:
Move with WASD / Left stick.
Dash with Left shift / L2.
Tilt with Q og E / L1 og L2.
Interact with Space / X(A).
Camera with Mouse / Right stick.

Village buidling:
Move with WASD / Left stick.
Rotate house with Q og E / L1 og L2.
Place with Space / X(A).

Settings / menues:
Pause with Escape / Start.
Navigate with Mmouse / Left stick OR D-Pad.
Submit with Mouseclick / X(A).
